segments.advisor_message: So, to clarify, you mentioned that you currently have an ISA with the total value around fifteen thousand, right?
segments.client_message: Uh, actually, I think I mixed that up. I, um, I meant to say it's more like, uh, not fifteen, but ten thousand. Yeah, that's it, I remember now!

segments.advisor_message: No problem at all, thanks for clearing that up! And who is the provider of that ISA?
segments.client_message: Oh, it’s with a, um, big bank. I’ll get back to you on the exact name, though. Just one second!
